channel.title: Adding Doors
channel.description: FFS I looked lots of places, they looked like good tutorials but none of them make sense lmao, I feel like a complete retard asking this question, but how would I make a door (large door *the wider type*), put it ingame, and make it so when you click it, it puts you on the other side of it...

item.title: Adding Doors
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

If you get the Object ID message sent to you, go to actionhandler.java (if PI) and do case objectid: c.getPA().movePlayer()"x coord, y coord, height"); break something like that… it may not be exact to what i put but you can figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Doors
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Someone explaining here will just be the same as reading one of those tutorials. Try and find an already existing door that works and copy the method of doing so.

Read full topic
